function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability of air change rates in different seasons","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to inconsistent ventilation","Mitigation":"Implement adaptive ventilation systems to adjust for seasonal air change rate variations","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems with sensors for real-time air change rate monitoring","People":"Inhabitants of the house","Owner":"Homeowners or property managers"},{"Description":"Bimodal distribution of air change rates","Impact":"Challenges in predicting and managing indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Use statistical modeling to account for bimodal distribution in ventilation planning","Technologies":"Statistical modeling software for indoor air quality analysis","People":"Indoor air quality specialists","Owner":"Building owners or facility managers"},{"Description":"Meteorological parameters affecting air change rates","Impact":"Inconsistent ventilation performance based on weather conditions","Mitigation":"Utilize weather forecasting data to adjust ventilation systems in advance","Technologies":"Integration of weather data with building automation systems","People":"Building engineers and maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management team"}]}
